page.title: 19THOUGHTS ON WORSLEY
page.content: THOUGHTS ON WORSLEY {THE GOOD}_ The linear parkway is pleasant for people to walk their dogs on, or if you just want a quiet stroll the linear parkway is just the place for you because it's {very quiet}.We are lucky to have the park with swings and roundabouts and tennis courts. I like to go swimming in my spare time at the swimming baths. {THE BAD}_ The litter in Worsley is all over the place. People just throw crisp packets and toffee papers all over the place. {THE UGLY}_ Graffiti spoils the look of garages, walls and the bandstand. People break windows and railings and leave broken glass where children and dogs may cut themselves. BY GARRY JONES
